select ci.id, ci.user_id, ci.room_code, ci.create_date, ui.name as userName, ui.images as userImages, ri.name as roomName, ri.images, ri.floor, ri.room_size, rt.type_name from collect_info ci left join user_info ui on (ui.id = ci.user_id) left join room_info ri on (ri.code = ci.room_code) left join room_type rt on (rt.id = ri.`type`) where 1 = 1
AND ri.name LIKE CONCAT('%',#{collectInfo.roomName},'%')
AND rt.type_name LIKE CONCAT('%',#{collectInfo.typeName},'%')
AND ui.name LIKE CONCAT('%',#{collectInfo.userName},'%')
order by ci.create_date desc
